author: philego
title: Got-It-All
review: I have owned this set for over 20 years and the box is still in excellent condition. And any time young children are visiting I pull this set out for them to play with. With four mini-figs a dog a horse and an elephant you can't go wrong. Throw in the fact that this is a train pulled by a tractor and there is a working cannon that shoots out a figure, this set has got it all.
